channel.title: Wave Minigames?
channel.description: Hey i was wondering if anyone knows how to make wave minigames like a nazi zombies sort of. What i mean by it is you go into an area and there are levels and in level one you have to kill lets say 5 NPC's and when you kill those 5 you go onto the next wave and more come and so on and so on. Anyone know how to do one of those?

item.title: Wave Minigames?
item.dc:creator: @y0u_kn0w_m3 y0u kn0w m3
item.description:
@y0u_kn0w_m3 wrote:

[quote=“shon1091@hotmail.com, post:2, topic:336274”]what do u mean?
it will teleport u to another place after u kill’em
or after u kill’em another’s r coming…[/quote]

Like jad kind of. Once you kill all of them the next wave comes (in the same area)

Read full topic
